name: The Grip Games minis Collection
description:
5 minis games in the collection:

The Impossible Game
One Epic Game
Minisquadron
Blimp: The Flying Adventures
5-in-1 Arcade Hits

The Impossible Game, One Epic Game, Minisquadron, Blimp: The Flying Adventures, 5-in-1 Arcade Hits:

Compatible with PlayStation®3, PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) and PlayStation®Vita.
1MB minimum space required
1 Player
This product supports the following languages: In-game speech: English On-screen text: English.
